price: Wͻ Nokorε Ahennwa no ho wͻ Ɔhene Tumfoͻ no a, Ɔtumi adeε nyinaa yε no hͻ.
arabic: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fī maqʿadi ṣid'qin ʿinda malīkin muq'tadirin
